score: 1 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Tea Leoni was a waste of time.  The plot with her was not THAT interesting.   I found myself waiting for more of Freeman, Wood, or the Messiah crew.  ( (note to those who haven't seen the movie, Messiah is what Deep Impact is  sending to destroy the comet))
